title: Pool Party Rek'Sai Canceled Recall
body: So I just bought the new PP Rek'Sai skin and I noticed that if you recall while burrowed, it cancels her recall while un-borrowed. The recall plays up until she comes out of the water to eat the frog but then she resumes being burrowed. I'm sad! :c

replies.body:
Hey Star Senpai, 

When she's burrowed, there shouldn't be a recall animation - this is the same across all skins, and her base.

If you have something that shortens recall - Phasewalker Mastery, Baron, the full recall won't play if she's un-burrowed.

EDIT: Animator says this may have broken  for the un-burrowed state - it was originally set up to play regardless. We're looking into it!

Thanks for replying!

And yes, I know her un-burrowed has no recall animation, but I mean when she's suppose to eat the frog, the animation cancels and she returns to her burrowed state. I can post a video if it'll help show what I mean xD

EDIT: Here's the link to a video to show what I mean ( https://youtu.be/HhtQfAeEhFI )
I hope that helps a bit. The best part of the recall gets cancelled Dx
